function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater","Impact":"Inaccurate detection may lead to false sense of security in the community or missed early warning signs of widespread infection","Mitigation":"Refinement of detection methods and evaluation of different assays through intra-and inter-laboratory studies","Technologies":"RT-qPCR assays, sequencing, virus concentration methods","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Monte Carlo simulation estimation of infections in catchment basin","Impact":"Underestimation of infection rates leading to inadequate public health response","Mitigation":"Continuous refinement of estimation methods based on new data and improved understanding of environmental factors","Technologies":"Monte Carlo simulation, data analysis tools","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Use of RT-qPCR assays for wastewater monitoring","Impact":"Conflicting results from different assays may lead to inaccurate assessment of SARS-CoV-2 circulation","Mitigation":"Evaluation of different assays through intra-and inter-laboratory studies, method refinement","Technologies":"RT-qPCR assays, data analysis tools","People":"Public health officials, laboratory technicians","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
